Name: HAZARDOUS CARGO IDENTIFICATION
Explanation: THE LITERAL IDENTIFICATION OF HAZARDOUS CARGO OTHER THAN THE USE OF THE INTERNATIONAL MARITIME DANGEROUS GOODS SYSTEM.

Name: HAZARDOUS CARGO DESIGNATOR, ABBREVIATED
Explanation: A REFERENCE CODE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE APPROVED DOCUMENTATION THAT INDICATES THE TYPE OF HAZARD ASSOCIATED WITH THIS CARGO.

Name: UNITED NATIONS NUMBER
Explanation: IDENTIFICATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS BY ITS UNITED NATIONS NUMBER.

Name: DANGEROUS GOODS CLASSIFICATION
Explanation: THE LITERAL IDENTIFICATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS BY ITS UNITED NATIONS CLASS.
